scripts.build:ts2abc-linux: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../../submodules/panda/cmake/toolchain/host_clang_8.cmake ../ts2abc && make ts2abc -j4
scripts.build:ts2abc-win: mkdir -p build-win && cd build-win && cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../../submodules/panda/cmake/toolchain/cross-clang-8-x86_64-w64-mingw32-static.cmake ../ts2abc && make ts2abc -j4
scripts.build:ts2abc-mac: mkdir -p build-mac && cd build-mac && cmake -DPANDA_ENABLE_CLANG_TIDY=false ../ts2abc && make ts2abc -j4
scripts.build: npm run build:irnodes && npm run build:diagnostic && npm run build:ts2abc-linux && npm run build:sources-linux
scripts.build-win: npm run build:irnodes && npm run build:diagnostic && npm run build:ts2abc-win && npm run build:sources-win
scripts.build-mac: npm run build:irnodes && npm run build:diagnostic && npm run build:ts2abc-mac && npm run build:sources-mac
scripts.build-full: npm run build && npm run build-win && npm run build-mac
scripts.test: npm run build:tests && npm run run:tests
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -fr build-win && rm -fr build-mac && rm -f src/irnodes.ts && rm -rf src/diagnostic.ts && rm -rf src/builtinsMap.ts
